name: svelte-circle-flags
description: Display SVG circle flag icons in Svelte applications.
readme:
# Svelte Circle Flags
360+ SVG icons from Circle-Flags Thank you for considering my open-source package. If you use it in a commercial project, please support me by sponsoring me [on GitHub](https://github.com/sponsors/shinokada). Your support helps me maintain and improve this package for the benefit of the community. ## Docs See the [Svelte Circle Flags documentation](https://svelte-circle-flags.codewithshin.com/) to learn more. ## Icons [Icon names](https://svelte-circle-flags.codewithshin.com/icons) ## Repo [GitHub Repo](https://github.com/shinokada/svelte-circle-flags) ## Installation ```sh pnpm i -D svelte-circle-flags ``` ## ISO 3166 Country Codes Most of the flags follow the ISO 3166 country codes. [ISO 3166 Country Codes](https://github.com/shinokada/svelte-circle-flags/blob/main/iso-3166-country-codes.md) ## Other icons [Svelte-Icon-Sets](https://svelte-svg-icons.codewithshin.com/) ## Original source [HatScripts/circle-flags](https://github.com/HatScripts/circle-flags) ## License [Svelte-Circle-Flags License](https://github.com/shinokada/svelte-circle-flags/LICENSE) [HatScripts/circle-flags License](https://github.com/HatScripts/circle-flags/blob/gh-pages/LICENSE.md)
